General.Name: PT Kusuma Kemindo Sentosa Tbk
General.Description: PT Kusuma Kemindo Sentosa Tbk deals in commodity and specialty chemicals, food materials, construction chemicals, and related materials in Indonesia. It offers leather and synthetic products; adhesive, textile, rubber, foam, and sole products; paint, coating, ink, thinner, plastic, resin, and PVC pipe products; food and drink products; construction and aluminum products; and wood finishings, such as furniture, door, frame, coffin, and instruments. The company was founded in 1990 and is headquartered in Jakarta, Indonesia.
